member.name: T:OpenXLive.Form.Controls.OrientedSize
member.summary: The OrientedSize structure is used to abstract the growth direction from the layout algorithms of WrapPanel. When the growth direction is oriented horizontally (ex: the next element is arranged on the side of the previous element), then the Width grows directly with the placement of elements and Height grows indirectly with the size of the largest element in the row. When the orientation is reversed, so is the directional growth with respect to Width and Height.

member.name: F:OpenXLive.Form.Controls.OrientedSize._orientation
member.summary: The orientation of the structure.

member.name: F:OpenXLive.Form.Controls.OrientedSize._direct
member.summary: The size dimension that grows directly with layout placement.

member.name: F:OpenXLive.Form.Controls.OrientedSize._indirect
member.summary: The size dimension that grows indirectly with the maximum value of the layout row or column.

member.name: M:OpenXLive.Form.Controls.OrientedSize.#ctor(OpenXLive.Form.Controls.Orientation)
member.summary: Initializes a new OrientedSize structure.
member.param: Orientation of the structure.

member.name: M:OpenXLive.Form.Controls.OrientedSize.#ctor(OpenXLive.Form.Controls.Orientation,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Initializes a new OrientedSize structure.
member.param: Orientation of the structure.
Un-oriented width of the structure.

member.name: T:OpenXLive.Form.ImageHelper
member.summary: Providers some method use to draw textue2D on the sprecifies area.
Compute the destination rectangle, sourc rectangle, actual origin. It can use the result to draw a image on specifies area.
member.param: The texture use to draw.

The center point of Image. X and Y is typically given as a value between 0 and 1. For example, (0.5,0.5) will represent center of the Image, or (1,1) would represent the bottom right corner of the Image. The default value is (0,0).
The size rectangle of the image.
Return destination rectangle the texture will be drawn.
Return source rectangle of texture.
Return the actual origin, it will be used as origin parameter on SpriteBatch.Draw method.
